positions.description: Main entrance of the Gun Store, suitable for character entry or exit.
Counter area where weapons and ammunition are displayed, ideal for transaction scenes.
Back storage room, suitable for secretive or tense scenes.
Shooting range inside the Gun Store, ideal for action or practice scenes.
Parking lot outside the Gun Store, suitable for vehicle parking or ambush scenes.

paths.description: A straight path from the main entrance to the counter area.
A narrow corridor leading from the counter area to the back storage room.
A direct path from the counter area to the shooting range.
A curved path from the main entrance to the parking lot.
A hidden path connecting the back storage room to the shooting range.

obstacles.description: A locked door blocking the corridor to the back storage room, requiring a key or force to open.
A target dummy partially obstructing the path to the shooting range.
An abandoned vehicle blocking part of the curved path to the parking lot.
A stack of crates blocking the hidden path between the back storage room and the shooting range.
